title: dc  won game but lost lp?
body: why is that? I dc the lats 6 minutes of the game got back we won but I lost lp why is that

replies.body:
If you're marked as a *Leaver* for a ranked match, the match will count as a loss for you and you'll lose LP for the match. This is outlined in our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q3).

Let me know if you have any questions.
why if you win you lose lp. it shouldn't matter how. dc or not
that is bs, i had to restart my computer because of a bugsplat, u are penalizing for ur bad programing
